Banking without opening hours, transfers from the couch and account movements always in view: Innovative functions and a fresh design make the app Sparkasse easy and intuitive for you. Take advantage of excellent banking and easily carry out your banking transactions on the side.

ADVANTAGES
• Check accounts anytime, anywhere
• Manage any number of online accounts - from savings banks and banks

• Know all about account transactions with the account alarm clock
• Find the shortest route to the nearest ATM or branch

The app Sparkasse will be there for you in all situations. No matter whether you set up a standing order while traveling on train, settle your bill at the breakfast table with photo transfer or check the account balance and credit card transactions. Annoying filling out a transfer form on the computer is no longer necessary. Instead, you can easily do everything with the iPhone/iPad.

ACCOUNT ALARM CLOCK
The account alarm clock informs you promptly about account transactions. If you want to know the accounts  daily basis, set up the account balance alarm clock. The salary alarm clock tells you when wages are received and the limit alarm clock lets you know when an account balance is exceeded or undercut.

GIROPAY | KWITT
A cozy evening with friends at your favorite restaurant is something nice. And sharing the bill is easy. With giropay | Kwitt you’ll send money from cell phone to cell phone without delay. This is also possible if you borrow money or collect money for a gift.

APPLE PAY
If you want to use Apple Pay, the app Sparkasse is a prerequisite. Activate your digital cards for the Wallet app.

HIGH SECURITY
If you use a high-quality, up-to-date banking app in combination with an up-to-date operating system and a secure internet connection, you don't have to worry about mobile banking. The app Sparkasse communicates via tested interfaces and ensures secure data transfer in accordance with the German requirements for online banking. All data is stored encrypted. Access is protected by a password and optionally by Touch ID/Face ID. The autolock function locks the app automatically. All finances are secured to the maximum in the event of loss. TÜV confirms the safety standards and re-tests them annually.

OTHER HANDY FEATURES
Use the search function across accounts and bank details, set up a budget book (offline account) for budget planning and view graphical evaluations of your finances. You have a direct line to your Sparkasse via app and access to many services such as card blocking, notifications, notepads, appointments and even the account opening via app (if offered by your Sparkasse). On top, you can switch directly to the app S-Invest and place securities.

PRECONDITIONS
You need an account with a German Sparkasse or Bank that has been activated for online banking (HBCI with PIN/TAN or FinTS with PIN/TAN). TAN methods supported for payment transactions are chipTAN manual, chipTAN QR, chipTAN comfort (optical), pushTAN; smsTAN.

HINTS
